comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.This contract includes one or more amendments. The consultant shall conduct a Phase I.Limited Phase II Environmental Site Assessment and Geotechnical Assessment for the Shared Services Canada Data Centre Building Project, located at the Canada Forces Base Borden, Ontario. Amended due to significant increase in scope of work (area of study site) for Phase II ESA and Geotechnical study.
